text: the pizza in las vegas is excellent and considered some of the best with frequently offered specials on great beer

their cupcakes are to die for i cant get enough of them the only downside is the calorie content despite the steep cost of 325 dollars and beyond for a single cupcake i still believe they deserve a rating of 4 stars its important to keep in mind that most people willingly shell out 325 dollars or more for a cup of coffee making it a reasonable tradeoff for a delightful treat

i have to give a big shout out to tracy and rip  they helped me get financed and find the perfect car for me  i love my new car  thank you thank you thank you to the wonderful team at earnhardt buick gmc

unfortunately my 200th review is for this typical american irish bar  the music selection was decent but unsuitable for the atmosphere the service lacked attention and my booth seat was collapsing moreover the bathroom was utterly repulsive to top it off i paid 7 for a minuscule whiskey cranberry in conclusion i have no intention of returning

i cant believe it my dreams have finally come true theres a barbecue joint just around the corner from my house is there an exceptional 6star rating available the food is absolutely delightful i pass by here every day either running or walking and if i didnt have selfcontrol astor house would most likely drain my bank account everyone should pay a visit and experience the incredible variety of delectable barbecue dishes and tasty sides

dtg has become increasingly enjoyable over the years with events like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters attracting more people despite the recession many shops in dtg have managed to thrive and it seems like more are returning as a resident of glendale im grateful for all the fun experiences dtg has to offer and eagerly anticipate many more in the future

its unfortunate that my 200th review is about this particular typical american irish bar the music choice was decent but not suitable for the overall atmosphere the service lacked attentiveness and my booth seat was collapsing the condition of the restroom was absolutely appalling and to top it off a tiny whiskey cranberry cost me 7 ultimately i have no intention of returning to this establishment

its interesting how this particular venue manages to combine two seemingly unrelated concepts  a strip joint and a steakhouse  without the dancers removing their bottoms i was genuinely intrigued to try it out myself but our anticipation turned into disappointment when they neglected our reservation and made us wait for more than 30 minutes regrettably this delay deprived us of experiencing the captivating peep show and indulging in their succulent steaks
if youre in vegas make sure to try their outstanding pizza which is highly regarded as one of the best and dont miss out on their fantastic beer promotions

its disheartening that i had to write my 200th review about this runofthemill american irish bar although they had a satisfactory music playlist it didnt quite suit the environment they were going for the service lacked diligence as my booth seat was on the verge of collapsing the state of the restroom was absolutely repulsive and on top of it all a minuscule whiskey cranberry ended up costing me 7 in essence i have no intention of ever revisiting this venue

the place is overcrowded and has an unpleasant odor the drink was decent and the price was acceptable unfortunately someone accidentally spilled my beverage due to being distracted by my wife dancing on the bar  its hard to blame him to his credit he even bought me a replacement drink i doubt if ill return though

in the event that it were possible for me to award zero stars i most definitely would my intention was to order pizzas for my workplace and during the phone call i was assured a wait time of 3045 minutes however it has now been two hours and we are still patiently waiting needless to say we are thoroughly dissatisfied with our experience at glass nickel pizza and we have decided that we will never place an order here again
i was disappointed by the rude behavior of all three waiters who attended to us as well as the poor quality of the calamari undercooked chili and only average tasting mussels and wings
oreganos was new territory for me and while the pizza was good it didnt surpass expectations maybe i should explore other options during my next outing

undeniably tacos el gordo provides the ultimate mexican dining experience in vegas offering authentic flavors that are unrivaled even by southern californias mexican food scene with reasonable prices and mouthwatering tacos its no wonder that youll be eager for seconds
this place has some of the most delicious food around i absolutely love it the bread salads and soups are all fantastic
this place offers some of the most delicious food around particularly their exceptional breads salads and soups
the food at this place is topnotch i have a great admiration for it the bread salads and soups are simply outstanding

despite its reputation as a strip club this establishment also operates as a steakhouse with the dancers maintaining their modesty by keeping their bottoms on while i personally wanted to have an experience there our table reservation was not honored forcing us to wait for over half an hour consequently we were unable to witness the peep show or savor their renowned steaks what a shame

the food has consistently been good at this place but ive noticed recently that the service has become slower with the new management and chef i strongly suggest trying the macadamia nut chicken  its delicious

given the chance i would absolutely rate this experience with zero stars i had called in an order for pizzas to be brought to my workplace and the person who took my order told me that the delivery would take anywhere between 30 and 45 minutes much to my dismay it has been a whopping two hours since that call and we are still starving and anxiously awaiting our meal i cannot emphasize enough just how unsatisfied we are with the quality of service received from glass nickel pizza rest assured we will not be repeating the mistake of ordering from them again
large store  great selection  not too busy so its easy to find a representative if you have questions

if it were feasible i would have given this glass nickel pizza establishment no stars at all our order for several pizzas intended for my workplace was placed with an estimated wait time of 3045 minutes during the phone call nevertheless it has already been two hours since then and we are still patiently anticipating our delivery this experience has left us incredibly dissatisfied guaranteeing that we will never patronize this place in the future

wow its like a dream come true theres a barbecue restaurant conveniently located near my place are there any extraordinary options with a topnotch 6star rating the cuisine is truly fantastic i go past this place daily whether jogging or strolling and if i lacked any restraint astor house would probably claim ownership of my entire bank account its definitely worth visiting and indulging in their superb barbecue offerings and mouthwatering side dishes

i thoroughly enjoyed all aspects of this establishment particularly the freshlycut french fries which were absolutely worth the journey
this place has so much to offer from their freshly cut french fries that are absolutely delicious and worth the trip
